Even the grandest forest begins with a single seedling.
—Llanowar saying
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The toughness is continuously calculated.

card.name: Tremor
card.ability: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
card.flavor: Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?

card.name: Twiddle
card.ability: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : This is not a toggle effect. If you use Twiddle to tap a card and before it takes effect your opponent taps it, Twiddle will not automatically untap the card.
10/4/2004 : The decision whether or not to tap or untap is made on resolution. This is not a modal spell.

card.name: Uktabi Wildcats
card.ability:
Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.
{G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Uktabi Wildcats.

card.name: Underground River
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Unholy Strength
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
card.flavor: "I don't feel any different."

card.name: Unsummon
card.ability: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Untamed Wilds
card.ability: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
card.flavor: No forest is so remote that the elves don't know its secrets.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
10/15/2006 : Can fetch a Snow land.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.ability: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
card.flavor: "I rely not so much on the wisdom of age as on the overconfidence of youth."

card.name: Vengeance
card.ability: Destroy target tapped creature.
card.flavor:
"It is the duty of the strong to oppose any who threaten the weak."
—The Southern Paladin

card.name: Verduran Enchantress
card.ability: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
card.flavor: Each spell has its own song, and the enchantress knows the dance for each.
card.ruling: 8/1/2005 : This does not trigger on the moving of an Aura from one permanent to another.

card.name: Vernal Bloom
card.ability: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
card.flavor: Spring breathes the magic of new life.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : This is a triggered mana ability. It does not go on the stack.

card.name: Vigilant Drake
card.ability:
Flying
{2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.
card.flavor: It can stay aloft for weeks with little or no sleep.

card.name: Vizzerdrix
card.flavor: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made that mistake again.

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.ability: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
card.flavor: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

card.name: Wall of Air
card.ability: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
card.flavor:
"Let the air itself protect you, for it is everywhere."
—Master wizard

card.name: Wall of Bone
card.ability:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
card.flavor: A skeletal wall, strengthened by the souls of traitors, rings the city of the Eastern Paladin.

card.name: Wall of Fire
card.ability:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: The erupting flames work as both barrier and weapon.

card.name: Wall of Spears
card.ability:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
card.flavor:
"A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend."
—Onean sergeant

card.name: Wall of Swords
card.ability: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
card.flavor: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

card.name: Wall of Wonder
card.ability:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}{U}{U}: Wall of Wonder gets +4/-4 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
card.flavor: They wondered at the size of it. It wondered which to eat first.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : Paying to make the Wall capable of attacking does not override the normal rule that a creature may not attack unless it began your turn on the battlefield.

card.name: Western Paladin
card.ability: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature.
card.flavor:
"Expect nothing but scorn, flattery, and lies. And never turn your back on him."
—The Northern Paladin

card.name: Wild Growth
card.ability:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
card.flavor: If you stop to listen, you can hear it grow.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The additional mana is not an ability of the land and is not something the land can produce.

card.name: Wildfire
card.ability: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.
card.flavor: Fire is always at the top of the food chain, and it has a big appetite.

card.name: Wind Dancer
card.ability:
Flying
{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
card.flavor: The sky is her stage.

card.name: Wind Drake
card.ability: Flying
card.flavor:
"But high she shoots through air and light,
Above all low delay,
Where nothing earthly bounds her flight,
Nor shadow dims her way."
—Thomas Moore,
"Oh that I had Wings"

card.name: Wing Snare
card.ability: Destroy target creature with flying.
card.flavor: The elves long ago mastered the art of hunting with nets. They call it "fishing the sky."

card.name: Wood Elves
card.ability: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
card.flavor: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

card.name: Wooden Sphere
card.ability: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
card.flavor: Strengthened by a thousand limbs.

card.name: Worship
card.ability: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
card.flavor:
"Believe in the ideal, not the idol."
—Serra
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : It reduces your life total to 1, not the damage to 1.
10/4/2004 : Worship does not prevent damage. It causes some damage to be unable to lower your life total. So any damage rendered useless by Worship was still dealt and is counted by effects that track the amount of damage done to a player. In addition, Worship does not prevent loss of life, so loss of life bypasses Worship.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.ability: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
card.ability: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.
card.flavor: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.

card.name: Yawgmoth's Edict
card.ability: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card.flavor: The warping of bodies and souls has become the heart of Yawgmoth's existence.
